sentences.en: A highway and a railway intersect here.
sentences.cn: 一条公路与铁路在此交叉.

sentences.en: And sunset shots time of impact intersect at two points.
sentences.cn: 与日出日落时的杆影相交于两点.

sentences.en: Any two diameters of a circle intersect each other.
sentences.cn: 圆周内两直径必相交.

sentences.en: BP is also working on a "relief well" to intersect the original well, but this is experimental and could take two to three months to stop the flow.
sentences.cn: 英国石油公司正努力使这座减压救险井与原先的那一座相交。 这还在实验阶段，而且可能要花上几个月的时间来停止这次的漏油事件。

sentences.en: Do you see any grey dots where the black lines intersect? In fact, there is nothing.
sentences.cn: 在黑色线条的交叉处，你能看到灰色的点儿吗？实际上，什么都没有。

sentences.en: Finally casts the parallel line which two never intersect.
sentences.cn: 最后铸就出两条永不相交的平行线.

sentences.en: How many times do the road and railway intersect ( with one another ) on this map?
sentences.cn: 在这张地图上公路与铁路 ( 彼此 ) 相交共有多少次?

sentences.en: How many times do the road and railway intersect (with one another) on this map?
sentences.cn: 在这张地图上公路与铁路（彼此）相交共有多少次?。

sentences.en: How many times do the road and railway intersect on this map?
sentences.cn: 在这张地图上公路与铁路相交共有多少次?

sentences.en: Prions act in the place where chemistry and geometry intersect.
sentences.cn: 普里安处于化学与几何学交汇之处.

sentences.en: So tell me about. You have done music, where do these things intersect for you?
sentences.cn: 那么，你已经做过音乐和，艺术，这些事情的交叉点在哪里呢？

sentences.en: Streets usually intersect at right angles.
sentences.cn: 马路通常以直角交叉.

sentences.en: The cables intersect the tower or pylon at different heights.
sentences.cn: 钢索在桥塔或塔柱的不同高度上相交.

sentences.en: The circles will intersect in two places.
sentences.cn: 这两个圆将在两处交叉。

sentences.en: The flight path would then either intersect the earth, or go off into space.
sentences.cn: 飞行轨迹不是和地球相交, 就是离开地球而进入宇宙空间.

sentences.en: The lines AB and CD intersect at E.
sentences.cn: 直线AB与直线CD相交于E点

sentences.en: The orbit of this comet intersects the orbit of the Earth.
sentences.cn: 这颗彗星的轨道和地球的轨道相交。

sentences.en: The place where two roads or streets join or intersect.
sentences.cn: 街角:两条路或街相连场地的地方.

sentences.en: The two roads intersect at the suburb of the city.
sentences.cn: 两条路在城郊交叉.

sentences.en: Their histories intersect.
sentences.cn: 他们的历史相互交叉。

words.tran_cn: 交叉；十字路口；交集；交叉点

trans.tran_en: if two lines or roads intersect, they meet or go across each other
